title: How do bloggers earn by just writing content? - Quora

response.answer_text: ***By Adding Value in Reader’s Life*** Bloggers/writers are people that have thoughts and learnings which they share with everyone through a blog. When they share such content, it can be perceived in 2 ways: Either you will not like the postOr it will add value to your lifeWhat does it mean to “Add value to a reader’s life”? Let’s see this blog post - Here's how you can Unlock 250 Netflix Secret categories with 1 simple trick If you are a Netflix user, this blog post will help you unlock 250+ hidden categories. With just 1 simple trick you will now be able to find new categories of films that you never knew. With this blog, I help add value to your life as now you can explore Netflix in a better way and find useful content. Here’s another example: Let’s see this blog post -V is Vindaloo - A to Z Challenge 2020 - Hindi, Bengali & Malayalam Recipe If you like cooking, then with this post, you will be able to find 5+ amazing recipes to make this. The best part is that I’ve added recipes in 4 different languages. Now people who know any 1 of these languages will benefit from my recipe blog. They will be able to easily create the vindaloo gravy recipe. This is how I add value to your life with my blogs. How does a blogger earn? It’s simple. Content as such is worth some money as people want to read these things. If you are an expert in your field, you will be paid to share your knowledge/learnings on your blog. This is how you can earn money!

When a blogger make great valuable content he will make money. When a blogger follow correct on page and off page SEO strategies he make money. When blogger write for people who wants to solutions for their questions a blogger makes money. Blogging means expressing yourself. You expressing your self by writing. It may be a blogger's knowledge or opinions. But when a blogger's content solves his audience problem he makes money.
